name: Witch undercover
description:
Hi Friend!
I am Cheryl, a witch from another dimension. By chance, my favorite hobby became magic tricks in an earthly circus. Unfortunately, the interdimensional law community did not appreciate my pastime. Help!!!

Game goal:
Fill the audience's happiness track with chaotic interactions with the audience

Controls: 
W A S D - Movement
CTRL - Magic shot or interaction with the viewer
SPACE - Dash
